item.description:

NEPW is a group established to provide learning opportunities to photographers of all experience levels!

By offering a comprehensive program of classes, workshops and photography experiences members can improve their skills and socialize with other people who share a passion and interest in photography.

Becoming a better photographer requires practice and a commitment to continuous learning.  The NEPW group is a friendly, fun platform for learning more about making better images. With the onslaught of rapid advances in digital photography technology the demand for quality information and insightful guidance has never been greater.

NEPW is place for photography education and enjoyment!
item.name: New England Photography Workshops
